ecc_agent_script_file.description: Bourne shell script to run DataPump job
ecc_agent_script_file.name: jobrun.sh
ecc_agent_script_file.script: # This script executes a single job. # A log file is created based on the job number. # # Edit these three variables before using this script. # Confirm that SNDML_LOGDIR exists and is writable by midserver account. SNDML_JAR=/opt/sndml/sndml-3.5.n-xxxx.jar SNDML_JAR=/opt/sndml/sndml-3.5.0.10-pg.jar SNDML_PROFILE=/opt/sndml/sndml.profile SNDML_LOGDIR=/opt/sndml/log # JOB_SYS_ID=$1 JOB_NUMBER=$2 SNDML_LOGFILE=$SNDML_LOGDIR/$JOB_NUMBER.log optlog="-Dlog4j2.configurationFile=log4j2-file.xml -Dsndml.logFile=$SNDML_LOGFILE" now=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") echo $now Starting Job $JOB_SYS_ID echo Log file is $SNDML_LOGFILE cmd=" java -ea $optlog -jar $SNDML_JAR --profile $SNDML_PROFILE --jobrun $JOB_SYS_ID" echo $cmd $cmd status=$? now=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") echo $now Exit Status=$status for job $JOB_SYS_ID
